data.meanings: to draw forth, take away, pluck out, bring out, snatch away, remove, strip off, tear off, extract, withdraw, draw out sharply, perform ones duty, yearn, depose high officials, resemble, draw with vigour, invite others to truth, rise, ascend, draw from the abode or bottom, carry off forcibly, deprive.
data.sentence: The word نَزَّاعَةً comes from the root ن ز ع and is associated with the meanings: to draw forth, take away, pluck out, bring out, snatch away, remove, strip off, tear off, extract, withdraw, draw out sharply, perform ones duty, yearn, depose high officials, resemble, draw with vigour, invite others to truth, rise, ascend, draw from the abode or bottom, carry off forcibly, deprive.

data.meanings: to roast/scald/grill. shawan - scalp, skin of head, skin even to the extremities (of the body).
data.sentence: The word لِلشَّوَى comes from the root ش و ي and is associated with the meanings: to roast/scald/grill. shawan - scalp, skin of head, skin even to the extremities (of the body).
